page.title: ServerlessDays London - Workshops
page.description: One Day. One Track. One Community

workshops.title: Building 100% Serverless Blog Site Application with Right Observability
workshops.description: Learn how to build a simplistic version of a blog site application in serverless and how to gain observability into the application and architecture with Thundra.
workshops.location: DAZN, 6th floor, 12 Hammersmith Grove, Hammersmith, London W6 0NW

workshops.title: Thundra Workshop
workshops.description: ServerlessDays London 2019 is happening on 11 July at Imperial College, South Kensington. New venue, expanded program, more Serverless! Get your Serverless on!
